scripts.prepare: cp -R ../src/assets app/; cp -R ../src/components app/; cp -R ../src/frameworks app/; rm -rf app/frameworks/test.framework; rm -rf app/components/**/*.e2e.*; rm -rf app/components/**/*.spec.*; rm -rf app/frameworks/**/**/*.spec.*; rm -rf app/frameworks/**/**/**/*.spec.*
scripts.start.ios: npm run prepare; tns emulate ios
scripts.start.android: npm run prepare; tns emulate android
